title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Blended Learning and Connectivism-Based Science Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and proficiency in fundamental digital tools
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute science projects in a blended learning environment.
Learners can construct and utilize knowledge networks by applying connectivism theory.
Learners can collaborate in real-time and exchange feedback using digital tools (BYOD).
Learners enhance their ability to integrate and analyze online/offline resources for scientific problem-solving.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
